name: @microfox/coingecko-api
title: CoinGecko API
description: A comprehensive TypeScript SDK for seamless interaction with the CoinGecko API, providing convenient access to cryptocurrency market data like price, coin lists, and market details.

readme_map.title: CoinGecko API
readme_map.description: The full README for the CoinGecko API

all_readmes.description: Constructor for the CoinGeckoSdk. Initializes the SDK with the provided API key.
Checks the usage of your CoinGecko API key.
Fetches simple price data for specified cryptocurrencies.
Lists all supported coins with their IDs, symbols, and names.
Fetches market data for specified cryptocurrencies.
Sends an HTTP request to the CoinGecko API.

constructors.name: CoinGeckoSdk
constructors.description: Create a new CoinGecko API client through which you can interact with the API

keyInstructions.setupInfo:
To use this SDK, you need to obtain a CoinGecko Pro API key. Follow these steps:

1. Sign up for a CoinGecko Pro account at https://www.coingecko.com/en/api/pricing
2. Once you have an account, navigate to your dashboard and find your API key
3. Store your API key securely and never share it publicly

To use the SDK, you'll need to provide your API key when creating an instance of the CoinGeckoSdk:

```typescript
import { createCoinGeckoSDK } from '@microfox/coingecko-api';

const sdk = createCoinGeckoSDK('YOUR_API_KEY');
```

Make sure to replace 'YOUR_API_KEY' with your actual CoinGecko Pro API key.

Note: This SDK uses the CoinGecko Pro API, which is a paid service. Each API request consumes one credit. Monitor your usage via the CoinGecko developer dashboard to avoid exceeding your plan limits.
